issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Investigate multithreaded discovery
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8137](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8137). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently FileSystemDatasetFactory Inpsects all files serially. For slow file systems or systems which support batched reads, this could be accelerated by inspecting files in parallel.
